title: broker authentication oauth flow
description: Test the OAuth-based authentication process for multiple broker providers including Zerodha Kite Connect and Upstox. Verify secure token storage, session persistence, and automatic token refresh functionality.

title: trading dashboard portfolio and market data display
description: Verify the main trading dashboard displays portfolio summary, real-time market data, P&L visualization, and quick action buttons correctly with responsive design across devices.

title: portfolio management holdings and performance
description: Test portfolio management features including holdings display, position tracking, P&L calculations, performance metrics, and export functionality to ensure accurate portfolio tracking and analysis.

title: ai chat interface response generation
description: Validate the AI-powered chat interface for trading insights including chat interface usability, AI response generation, trading context awareness, message history, and support for BYOAI providers.

title: trading signals real-time updates and history
description: Test the real-time trading signals feature for correct signal display, detailed signal information, mobile optimization, real-time updates, and signal history tracking.

title: responsive design across devices
description: Verify the mobile-first responsive design implementation across mobile, tablet, and desktop layouts including touch optimization and adaptive navigation.

title: accessibility features compliance
description: Test accessibility features for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, color contrast compliance, focus indicators, and ARIA labels.

title: performance optimization targets
description: Validate performance optimization targets such as page load time under 3 seconds, API response time under 2 seconds, memory usage under 100MB, code splitting, and asset optimization.
